channel.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
channel.description:
I don't have a game to test but, I do have a group interested in testing games.
I didn't see an obvious way to make that as a general offer. Should I just post that in Game Design?

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @ex1st
item.description:
@ex1st wrote:

Hi. I’m new here. And late to the party. But if you are still interested in playtesting games can you tell us what kind of games you like to play? I have some things but not sure if you are going to be into them.

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @PetriLeinonen
item.description:
@PetriLeinonen wrote:

I have a couple of games out in playtesting. There’s Them Deeper Bones, a retro adventure post-post-apocalyptic fantasy game of rediscovering your history. I like to describe “retro adventure ttrpg” as “if osr is wargaming combined with role-playing, retro adventure is that, except it’s an escape room combined with role-playing”.

And then there’s Cyberpunk is dead. that is a condensed FitD game about playing a faceless corporate hit squad in a cyberpunk world.

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @Amicitia_NZ
item.description:
@Amicitia_NZ wrote:

This sounds like my cup of tea! Keen to help if you need play testers on this one and if our times align (GMT+12). I am assuming Anglo-Saxon in flavour?

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @TheGiftOfGabes
item.description:
@TheGiftOfGabes wrote:

Hey! I suppose it was about time!!! Thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Bisogno
item.description:
@Ben_Bisogno wrote:

Gabe I am so excited to see you on the gauntlet!

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @TheGiftOfGabes
item.description:
@TheGiftOfGabes wrote:

Oh that’s neat!

I have a game I’d love you to try: https://thegiftofdice.itch.io/fantasypunk

Pitch: A TTRPG about exploring the world, meeting people, delving into dungeons and watching for each other. A dungeonpunk hack.

It’s based on both the PbtA and FitD engines.

This is a work in progress as some of the systems and parts are yet to come, but I figured I’d release this for the dunJAMpunk and for playtest.

This is my first reply, BTW! Yay!

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Hello Jonah! Can you tell us a little more about what types of games you and your playgroup are interested in testing? Any specific system (e.g. Powered by the Apocalypse, Forged in the Dark…) you prefer? Or how about genres or subject matters you’re interested in? That might help us refine the playtest offerings we’re sending you!

Thanks again for sharing your interest in playtesting. As you can see, many folks are interested in taking you up on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @dannythewall
item.description:
@dannythewall wrote:

I do need more eyes on my Battlestreets if it’s something interesting to you

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Once I get Against the Dark Conspiracy out the door I will be going back to my PbtA game of Dark Age heroes protecting mortals from the supernatural, Eotenweard … so I may well be in touch.

Read full topic

item.title: Seeking Games To Playtest?
item.dc:creator: @Airk
item.description:
@Airk wrote:

Aw man; I’m in the middle of a relatively substantial revision on my game, and I’m not sure if testing with the old stuff would be worth it.

That said, if this sounds interesting, then it wouldn’t take much for me to put together a ‘beta’ version of the next update.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Amicitia_NZ
item.description:
@Amicitia_NZ wrote:

Great to know Jonahknight. When I’m close to a beta version of my game I’ll be in touch
